scripts.build: npm install && npm run clean && npm run images-min && npm run build-css && npm run build-google-resources && npm run build-html
scripts.build-css: npm run sass-lint && npm run sass-to-css
scripts.build-html: npm run build-data && mustache index.json index.mustache > index.html && npm run minify-html
scripts.clean: rimraf index.html && rimraf index.json && rimraf dist
scripts.images-min: imagemin resources/img/* --out-dir=dist/img && imagemin resources/img/logos/* --out-dir=dist/img/logos && imagemin resources/img/hobbies/* --out-dir=dist/img/hobbies
